findings.title: SQL Injection Vulnerability
findings.description: Unsanitized user input used in SQL query
findings.code: String sql = "SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = " + id;

findings.title: Command Injection Vulnerability
findings.description: Unsanitized user input used in command execution
findings.remediation: Validate and sanitize user input before using in command execution

findings.title: Hardcoded Credentials
findings.description: Hardcoded API key and password in source code
findings.remediation: Store secrets in environment variables or a secure vault

findings.title: SQL Injection Vulnerability
findings.description: Unsanitized user input used in SQL query
findings.code: query := fmt.Sprintf("SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = %s", id)
findings.remediation: Use parameterized queries with prepared statements

findings.title: Command Injection Vulnerability
findings.description: Unsanitized user input used in command execution
findings.remediation: Validate and sanitize user input before using in command execution

findings.title: Hardcoded Credentials
findings.description: Hardcoded API key and password in source code
findings.remediation: Store secrets in environment variables or a secure vault
